name: Fennekin

evolution.description: Fennekin can evolve into Braixen at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 6 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Fox Pokémon. Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Magician
abilities.description: If not already holding an item, this Pokémon steals the held item of any Pokémon it hits with a melee attack.
